portfolio.title: QuickSaveApp
portfolio.description: Quick Save is a safety-focused app designed to provide users with quick access to critical emergency information and resources. With features like real-time location sharing, emergency contacts, and quick alert notifications, the app ensures users can swiftly respond in emergency situations.

portfolio.title: Decentralized Storage System
portfolio.description: A Decentralized Storage System built with Rust leverages blockchain and distributed technologies to offer secure, scalable, and censorship-resistant storage solutions. By utilizing Rustâ€™s performance and memory safety features, the system ensures efficient data storage while preventing data tampering and centralization risks.

portfolio.title: Smart Irrigation Farm
portfolio.description: The Smart Irrigation Project is designed to optimize water usage in agricultural practices using IoT technology. By integrating soil moisture sensors, weather data, and automated irrigation systems, the project ensures that crops receive the right amount of water at the right time.
